content: I can’t be reading this at work — people are looking at me as if I’ve gone nuts. Loved #12 & #15.So Dennis Rodman is no longer a fan of Kim Jong-un? Didn’t he make a state visit to N. Korea? Ahhhh, he’ll negotiate for the US since he’s buddies with Kim. I can almost believe this though — I wouldn’t put it past Trump to hire DR.
